title: Enhancing Teaching Method Practical Skills: Course for Strengthening Mathematical Inquiry Skills via Ecological Field Observations

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational ecology concepts and basic statistical knowledge
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can quantitatively interpret data collected from ecological fieldwork using mathematical tools (frequency, ratio, correlation).

Learners can discover patterns in ecological phenomena and perform hypothesis-testing processes through worksheet-based guided instruction (guided observation → autonomous observation → extended inquiry).
Learners can reconstruct observational records with immediate feedback from mobile devices and improve data interpretation accuracy by over 80% through collaboration with peer learners.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
